line: monicas making us watch old yeller
why are you guys so upset
it is old yeller it is a happy movie
cmon happy family gets a dog frontier fun
yeah but phoebs what about the end
what when yeller saves saves the family from the wolf and everyones happy
that is when my mother would shut off the tv and say the end
what about the part where he has rabies
he does not have rabies he has babies
that is what my mom said
uh phoebe i do not think your mom would want you to see what is about to happen
what what is about to happen
hey travis watcha doin with that gun
oh no no no travis put down the gun
no no no no he he is your buddy he is your yeller no no no the end the end
hey have you guys eaten because uh richard and i just finished and we have got leftovers
ya know one of these times you are gonna really be naked and we are not gonna come over
alright got a leg three breasts and a wing
well how do you find clothes that fit
oh hey monica we have got a question
alright for the bizillionth time yes i see other women in shower at the gym and no i do not look

yeah ross cannot go so it is between my friend eric prower who has breath issues and dan with the poking
do you want some more beer
hey why do not you ask richard
ok uh hey richard if you had an extra ticket to the knicks game and you had to choose between a friend who smells and one who bruises you who would you pick
well being a huge knicks fan myself i think you should take someone who is a huge knicks fan
i meant why do not you take richard to the game
keeps his fingers to himself and he is always minty fresh
i do not know richards really nice and everything uh it is just that we do not know him really well ya know and plus he is ya know old er than some people but uh younger than some buildings
so what he is a little older big deal i mean he is important to me
ya know if you ask him he might take you on his jag
how do we say yes now and make it seem like we are not doin it just to ride in the cool car
monica we will bring him but only if he takes the jaguar
no no you are fine you are fine
oh you guys are not gonna believe what happened
ok we were sitting over there playing on the floor and he grabs the table and he pulls himself up
sorry you guys missed it but i did tape it so it you guys want to see it
uhh we know he already did it last week
you can watch our tape if you want
i miss i miss the first time of everything
i missed what the first time he rolled over the first time he crawled
has he spoken yet is he driving does he have a favorite liquour
actually he is getting closer on the talking thing
he cannot quite say mama yet but once he said yumen
ooh i so sick of missing stuff
ya know i want him for more than than a day i want him for a whole weekend
no listen i mean i feel like
i mean i i had a whole speach prepared
oh shout that would have been fun
oh look did did you just see that
he just waved he just waved he is never waved before you have never waved before
ok love story brians song and terms of endearment
wow all you need now is the killing fields and some guacamole and you have got yourself a part ay
yeah i talked to my grandma about the old yeller incident and she told me that my mom used to not show us the ends of sad movies to shield us from the pain and sadness
you know before she killed herself
where is he where is richard
yeah right after we stole his lunch money and gave him a wedgie
what is the matter with you he is parking the car
yeah he let us drive his jaguar
wow he must like you the best
oh what about that thing he did when he tipped the guy who showed us to our seats
you never even saw the money it was like this
hey chandler thanks for showing us to our seats
hey joey thanks for parking the car
gonna keep this by the way
so your first whole weekend without ben what are you guys gonna do
uh we are going down to colonial williamsburg
yeah a woman i went to college with just became the first female blacksmith down there
well ya know they are a little behind the times in colonial williamsburg
think i better go before mommy starts weeping
joey do you know we can see you from here
how come richard looks so much cooler with one of these than me
well for starters you may want to light it and lose the spatula
you know what i think it is cute you trying to be more like richard
not like him per se just not un like him
look it is the artist formerly known as chandler
just tryin somethin here ya know
so joey why did not you grow a moustache
i got the cigar he got the moustache
figured if we both grew it we had look like dorks
yeah you really sidestepped that land mine
hey listen we have gotta go i promised richard we had meet him downstairs
yeah we are goin to a ranger game
yeah did not he tell ya
well he told me he was going out with the guys i just did not know that you were the guys
with that moustache does not chandler remind you of aunt sylvia
it is ben and his da da
look gonna tell your momies you said it anyway so you might as well try
a while ago i got a sah out of him which i thought ya know might turn into sah condary caregiver but
hey would you uh would you hold him for a sec because i i gotta take this off
yeah well he is a baby not a bomb
well just hold him like you had hold a football
this is how i would hold a football
ok sorry just not very good with babies
i mean i have not been around them i mean you know since i was one
it is alright it is no big deal
yeah definitely sure you will feel totally different when it is our baby
you think about stuff like that
i mean actually i kinda think that we will have we will have two babies
ya know a boy and a girl
hopefully the girl will come first so ben here will not feel too competitive
well we will not wanna raise kids in the city so we will probably move to uh scarsdale
yeah that way i figure ya know we will be far enough away from our parents that we do not have to see them all the time but close enough that they can come over and babysit whenever we want
and yes i know the taxes are a little higher than let us say nassau county but the school systems supposedly great
off my break now so uh um here you take this and um i am gonna go pour these very nice people some coffee
oh look at that i do not have a pot
i do not have a pot
well hey maybe got one at home or in scarsdale
oh ok murder cancer soccer teams eating each other in the andes
so you watched the movies huh
uh huh what is happening to the world
i mean no no no because et leaves and and rocky loses charlotte dies
with the web the spider she dies she does
it is like ya know hey welcome home from the hospital thud
so you cannot lose it is there in the title
please i almost fell for that with uh pride of the yankees i thought i was gonna see a film about yankee pride and then boom the guy gets lou gehrigs disease
uh the guy was lou gehrig
did not you kinda see it coming
phoebe just watch that i promise it will resotre all your faith in humanity
uh yeah i just got my pick up sticks back from the shop
listen um honey i appreciate this but you do not have to keep hanging out with them for me i mean they have each other
oh no honey i mean do not worry i like hanging out with those guys
they are different than my other friends they do not start sentences with you know who just died shoveling snow
alright that is great then just go
uh it is the college playoffs
uh they are not in it
oh why does this bother me so much
i mean i do not wanna be one of those people who tells their boyfriend they wanna spend 24 hours a day with them
it is just that he does not have that much free time ya know and i do not know what do i do
you are ultimately just gonna die or get divorced or have to blow your pets head off
richard made plans again with the guys
yeah well ross just made plans for the whole century
ya know what i think gonna go to my room and read cosmo maybe there is something helpful in there
know what at least maybe i can learn how to do an at home bikini wax with leftover cristmas candles
ok what the hell happened back there
i do not know you tell me
one minute holding ben like a football the next thing i know got two kids living in scarsdale complaining about the taxes
well sorry i think about stuff
ya know i mean you are at work you are assembling bones your mind wanders
ross you have planned out the next 20 years of our lives we have been dating for six weeks
cmon what you never think about our future
yes but i i think about who is apartment we are gonna sleep at tomorrow night and and where we are gonna have dinner next saturday night
i do not think about what our childrens names are gonna be
you know what our childrens names are gonna be
no no i mean ya know i i read a book and there was a girl named emily and i thought i thought that might be good
the big book of childrens names
ok ross ross ok listen what we have is amazing
but i do not want to have everything decided for me
i spent my whole life like that
it is what i had with barry that was one of the reasons i left
i i like not knowing right now and sorry if that scares you but if you want to be with me you are gonna have to deal with that

ok then you are gonna have to understand that you are with a guy who is not gonna stop planning his future with you because he knows that we are gonna end up together and if that scares you tough because you are gonna have to deal with that
well that is the first time we have said that
oh thanks for the great movie tip
you know i do not know if i was happier when um george bailey destroyed the family business or um donna reid cried or when the mean pharmacist made his ear bleed
alright give you the ear thing but do not you think the ending was pretty wonderful
i did not watch the ending i was too depressed
it just kept getting worse and worse it should have been called it is a sucky life and just when you think it cannot suck any more it does
he gets it back pass to the middle lines it up and
could that shot be any prettier
well we had a table in college
oh really i did not know they had foosball in the 1800s
when puberty hits that things really gonna kick in
uh not to sound too florence henderson but dinners on the table
see that is why we do not let her play
oh hey listen do not be mad at him it is our fault
sorry we have been hoggin so much of his time
yeah he is just really great to hang around with
no no seriously chandler and i were just talkin about this
he is so much cooler than our dads
i mean you know our dads are ok ya know but richard is just ow ow
what are you kickin me for
uh you guys see me as a dad
your just your just clearly not familiar with our young persons vernacular
see when we say dad we mean buddy
no no seriously joeys my dad monicas my dad
even got some dads down at work
well your other dad and i are gonna go have a romantic evening and i guess just see you kids around
i cannot believe you got us into trouble
yeah just i feel like about a hundred
i thought i was just one of the guys
make you feel like one of the guys
you know for a really cool guy you suck at foosball
what are you talkin about i was killin em
ok and then you take the poopie diaper and you put it in the poopie diaper pail
ok ross just so you know calling it a poopie diaper does not make this process any cuter
gonna get the rest of his stuff together
ok we can do this now cannot we ben
yes we can yes we can
look at that oh stays on and everything
sorry what did you just say
oh my god ross ross ben just said hi
great great and i miss that too i miss everything
oh sorry i guess i just bring it out in him
ben just said his first word
mommy is so proud of you
you know actually it is more like hi
ok this could go on for a while
we have got a cab waiting downstairs
uh we should really do it again sometime whadya say
did did he just did he did he just say he said bye
you said you said bye to me
suddenly seeing him go off to college
we have gotta go we have got that cab waiting
oh wow look at this nice deep hole been digging
hey bert is not this a nice hole here

now looked ahead on the tape and he does find him again
but ok before that happens there is some pretty rough goin for a while but i think we can handle it
